name: DittoTalesforParents
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ditto tales
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Do you enjoy reading books out loud with your kids or loved ones? Well now there is a companion skill for that. 

The Ditto Tales skill provides accompanying sounds as you read a the lines in the story. Books are available on Amazon.com or go to DittoTales.com for more information.

For example if you read aloud "Bah, Bah Black Sheep", Alexa will pick up on that and you will here sheep bahing to each other.

The books are special edition books. If the line is red then an accompanying sound will be played by Alexa.

Utilizing Amazon Alexa and featured books
We can create a NEW and ENHANCED story time experience!

See DittoTales.com for more information.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
